testcase.classname: As an administrator, I should be able to access the detailed information of the course category with
testcase.name: When a GET request is sent to the /api/category/{id} endpoint with valid authorization information
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/category/25416" path parameters....................passed * The api user sends a GET request and saves the returned response..........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 203.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "remark" information in the response body is "failed"..passed * The api user verifies that the "data.message" information in the response body is "There is not category for this id."..passed
